channel.title: How I can make NPC?
channel.description: First of all, I should confess that I am a noob, new for the private service. :D I want to ask where I can input NPCs and how can I find the coordinations? My email is : b13chen@yahoo.com Anyone knows please tell me and help me solve the problem. Can any one teach me how to spawn monsters and NPCs? PLZ? :)I would be apppreciated if you teach me how to do it.

item.title: How I can make NPC?
item.dc:creator: @_saporta _saporta
item.description:
@_saporta wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye, post:2, topic:8497”]1. Wrong section
2. It’s Private SERVERS
3. They’re not new
4. You could find the answer by looking around.[/quote]
+1

Johndabest:

yeah how about answering the fucking question you snobby cunt

fag.
